original_text:
or wealth lost through some misfortune,
so that when they have children
    there is nothing left for them to inherit.
korean_text: 그 재물이 재난을 당할 때 없어지나니 비록 아들은 낳았으나 그 손에 아무것도 없느니라

sentences.original_text: or wealth lost through some misfortune
so that when they have children
there is nothing left for them to inherit
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 물려받을 것이 아무것도 남지 않는다
